src:
Javid v McDonnell: Tory and Labour parties reveal economic plans – video
07 Nov 2019, 15:40 by Reuters



The chancellor, Sajid Javid, has announced the Conservative party will borrow and invest around £20bn a year and said the Labour party is responsible for putting the UK in debt. His Labour counterpart, John McDonnell, pushed a Labour plan for investment of £400bn to counter what he called the twin crises of the climate emergency and social deprivation


Sajid Javid rips up Tory fiscal rules with vow to spend extra £20bn


John McDonnell unveils Labour plans for £400bn in investment
text:
Javid v McDonnell: Tory and Labour parties reveal economic plans – video
07 Nov 2019, 15:40 by Reuters



The chancellor, Sajid Javid, has announced the Conservative party will borrow and invest around £20bn a year and said the Labour party is responsible for putting the UK in debt. His Labour counterpart, John McDonnell, pushed a Labour plan for investment of £400bn to counter what he called the twin crises of the climate emergency and social deprivation


Sajid Javid rips up Tory fiscal rules with vow to spend extra £20bn


John McDonnell unveils Labour plans for £400bn in investment
